Reviews.Title: The best camera in my collection!
Reviews.Author: vince r
Reviews.Content: Upgraded from Canon 60D. This is by far the best camera I have ever owned! I love the ease of use and menu selections. Works even better with my 24-70 L. The fps is great!

ProductInfo.Features:
Canon EOS 5D Mark III 22.3 MP Full Frame CMOS with 1080p Full-HD Video Mode Digital SLR Camera
A newly designed 22.3MP full-frame CMOS sensor providing highly detailed, rich images with a maximum resolution of 5616 x 3744 pixels. Features a high S/N ratio and larger individual pixels for increased visual depth and cleaner looking pictures.
DIGIC 5+ Image Processor promotes significantly greater overall performance and response from all aspects of the camera; improves continuous shooting rate, bringing it to 6 full-resolution frames-per-second, improves noise reduction, and many more.
Newly designed 61-point autofocus interface ensures critical focus in all challenging situations. Featuring up to 41 cross-type AF points and 5 dual diagonal AF points; this AF system is highly accurate and extremely low-light sensitive.
Full HD video recording is supported in multiple formats. Longer continuous recording times, up to 29 minutes 59 seconds. Both All i-frame and IPB compressions are supported as well as the standard H.264/MPEG -4 AVC codec.
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS 5D Mark III Digital SLR Camera Body
